channel.title: Posts on Muhammad Usman
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Muhammad Usman

item.title: Google Summer of Code 2019: Improve Article Recommendation Pipeline
item.description: GSoC Project Proposal: Improve Article Recommendation Pipeline Mentor: Bahodir Mansurov Synopsis The project improved the article recommendation pipeline by solving the various issues in the article-recommender projects. The issues that were solved as a part of the project are:

item.title: GSoC Coding Period Update 3
item.description: I am working on the third issue. In the translation end point of the Recommendation API, currently we fetch the wikidata_id from the respective wikipedia API and then we have a SparQL query that gets the data about the sitelink_counts and removes the disambiguation pages.

item.title: GSoC First Evaluation
item.description: First Evaluation Summary: Issues completed: T216721: Remove duplicate Wikidata items from article recommendations T215222: Recommendation API translation endpoint stopped working Issue currently being worked upon: T216750: Article recommendation API: replace WDQS with MW API I finally received the mentor evaluation.

item.title: GSoC Coding Period Update 2
item.description: I started working on the second issue. The Recommendation API translation endpoint used to fail intermittently. After investigating the issue, the point where the bug was being caused was found. The internal request being made to the MediaWiki API was returning a server error due to issues with the API (Russian MediaWiki API in our case).

item.title: GSoC Coding Period Update 1
item.description: The coding period officially started from May 27. My first task was to Remove duplicate Wikidata items from article recommendations. I had a clear understanding of what had to be done to fix the issue.

item.title: GSoC 2019 with Wikimedia Foundation
item.description: What is GSoC? Google Summer of Code is a program sponsored by Google to introduce students to open source programming. Students work on the projects mentored by different open source organizations.

item.title: Making a PR to GitHub Repository
item.description: #logo { box-shadow: none; width: 200px; } Forking and Cloning the Project Fork Project on GitHub from the Main Repository to your own profile. Clone the forked repository.
